description:
Bubble Trouble 3 brings the beloved arcade classic to the Nintendo Switch™ with its signature bubble-popping chaos. Wield your harpoon to split bouncing bubbles into smaller ones until they vanish, but dodge them to stay alive! With vibrant visuals and nostalgic gameplay, this sequel offers solo challenges or thrilling local co-op. Master 47 unique levels and prove you’re the ultimate bubble buster!
Bullet Points:  
Retro Arcade Thrills: Shoot and dodge bubbles in fast-paced, addictive gameplay that’s simple yet challenging.  

Local Co-Op Action: Team up with a friend on one Nintendo Switch for cooperative bubble-popping fun.  

Diverse Levels & Weapons: Tackle 47 varied stages with four unique weapons, including harpoon, hook, laser, and mine.  

Nostalgic Challenge: Split bubbles strategically to clear levels and chase high scores in this timeless adventure.
